text: pitabrakd nasa banda anak del thveu kechch promoprieng(now thngai a l hau tei pi yah) cheamuoy anak( mou ham meat) tampit ku puokke thveu kechch promoprieng cheamuoynung a l laoh . dai robsa a l laoh krob dandab leu dai robsa puokke . dau che neah anaknea haey kbat nouv kechch prom prieng noh ku pitabrakd nasa ke kbat champoh khluoneng . haey anak na del bampenh nouv avei del ban sanyea champoh a l laoh noh ku trong nung bratan aoy ke nouv phalbony yeang thomtheng
